verses.text: \w Listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* islands;\f + \fr 49:1 \ft Or coastlands\f* \w pay|strong="H7181"\w* \w attention|strong="H7181"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w distant|strong="H7350"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*: \w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w womb|strong="H4578"\w*; \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w body|strong="H4578"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* mother \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w My|strong="H5650"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* whom \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* display \w My|strong="H5650"\w* \w glory|strong="H6286"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w labored|strong="H3021"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w spent|strong="H3615"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w futility|strong="H1892"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*; \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* vindication \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H6468"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w Me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* womb \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w might|strong="H5797"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Him|strong="H7725"\w*— \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w honored|strong="H3513"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*—

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* says: “\w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* enough \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* protected ones \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w light|strong="H7043"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w ends|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* earth.”\f + \fr 49:6 \ft Cited in Acts 13:47\f*

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Him|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* despised \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w abhorred|strong="H8581"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w*: “\w Kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w You|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w*, \w because|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* faithful, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* chosen \w You|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H7522"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w*;\f + \fr 49:8 \ft LXX In the time of favor I heard You, and in the day of salvation I helped You; cited in 2 Corinthians 6:2\f* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w appoint|strong="H5414"\w* \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w restore|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w apportion|strong="H5157"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w inheritances|strong="H5159"\w*,

\w to|strong="H3318"\w* say \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* prisoners, ‘\w Come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*,’ \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, ‘\w Show|strong="H1540"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w*.’ \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2822"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pathways, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* find \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* barren \w hill|strong="H8205"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6770"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w scorching|strong="H8273"\w* \w heat|strong="H8273"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.\f + \fr 49:10 \ft Cited in Revelation 7:16\f* \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w guide|strong="H5095"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w springs|strong="H4002"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Shout|strong="H7442"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*; \w break|strong="H6476"\w* \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* song, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7355"\w* \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* ones.

\w But|strong="H5800"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*!”

“\w Can|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w her|strong="H7911"\w* \w nursing|strong="H5764"\w* \w child|strong="H1121"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* lack \w compassion|strong="H7355"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7911"\w* womb? \w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H1571"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*!

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w inscribed|strong="H2710"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palms|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*; \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w are|strong="H3709"\w* \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H4480"\w* \w builders|strong="H1121"\w* \f + \fr 49:17 \ft DSS; MT Your sons\f* \w hasten|strong="H4116"\w* \w back|strong="H3318"\w*; \w your|strong="H4480"\w* \w destroyers|strong="H2040"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wreckers \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w jewelry|strong="H5716"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruined|strong="H2723"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w* \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w ravaged|strong="H8074"\w* land \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6258"\w* too small \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w devoured|strong="H1104"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6258"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H7368"\w*.

Then \w you|strong="H3205"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* say \w in|strong="H7604"\w* \w your|strong="H5493"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w for|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w*? \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w bereaved|strong="H7921"\w* \w and|strong="H3824"\w* \w barren|strong="H1565"\w*; \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* exiled \w and|strong="H3824"\w* \w rejected|strong="H5493"\w*. \w So|strong="H5493"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w reared|strong="H1431"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*? \w Look|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* all \w alone|strong="H7604"\w*, \w so|strong="H5493"\w* \w where|strong="H1992"\w* \w did|strong="H1473"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w come|strong="H3205"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w*?’”
